text: Euphorbia primulifolia is a species of plant in the family Euphorbiaceae. It is endemic to Madagascar. Its natural habitats are subtropical or tropical seasonally wet or flooded lowland grassland, subtropical or tropical high- altitude grassland, and rocky areas.this plant smells. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== Category:Endemic flora of Madagascar primulifolia Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot Category:Taxa named by John Gilbert Baker
title: Euphorbia primulifolia
